Summary: Good for you and taste great!
text:
I come from a high-fructose soaked nutrigrain bar eating family, but these are MUCH BETTER. The texture took a little getting used to but now I couldn't go back to the old stuff if I wanted. Not to mention far superior nutritional value, and ingredients you can see.

If you're tired of mashed up and molded who knows what kind of bars, these are definitely worth a try.
